string-array.name: club_desc
string-array.item: Futbol Club Barcelona, known simply as Barcelona and colloquially as Barça, is a professional football club based in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.
Real Madrid Club de Fútbol, commonly known as Real Madrid, is a professional football club based in Madrid, Spain.
Fußball-Club Bayern München e.V., commonly known as FC Bayern München, FCB, Bayern Munich, or FC Bayern, is a German sports club based in Munich, Bavaria.
Manchester City Football Club, also known simply as City or the Cityzens, is a football club based in east Manchester, England.
Manchester United Football Club, commonly known as Man. United or simply United, is a professional football club based in Old Trafford, Greater Manchester, England
Chelsea Football Club is a professional football club in London, England, that competes in the Premier League.
Associazione Calcio Milan, commonly referred to as A.C. Milan or simply Milan, is a professional football club in Milan, Italy, founded in 1899.
Arsenal Football Club is a professional football club based in Islington, London, England, that plays in the Premier League, the top flight of English football.
